title: Israel's Netanyahu Says He Can Form a Government
description: Benjamin Netanyahu will have seven days to finalize coalition deals with his allies before he can be sworn in as prime minister.

title: Brazil's Incoming President Lula da Silva Wins Approval to Spend Big
description: Congress voted to suspend the constitutional spending cap to allow higher outlays on the poor, spooking financial markets.

title: Biden Meets With Zelensky, Pledges Continued U.S. Support for Ukraine
description: The Ukrainian president met with President Biden and plans to address Congress during a whirlwind bid for additional aid to help fend off Russia.

title: U.S. Announces Nearly $2 Billion Arms Package Amid Zelensky Visit
description: The new arms package includes the Patriot air-defense system and bomb kits that enable precision strikes.

title: Putin to Boost Russian Military, Signaling Protracted War in Ukraine
description: President approves big increase to troop levels and orders improved weaponry and upgraded communications

title: Ukraine Defends Bakhmut Against Russian Assaults as Zelensky Heads to U.S.
description: The city has become a key target for Russia, which is trying to seize all of the Donetsk province.

title: Taliban Ban All Education for Girls
description: The Taliban banned girls from attending elementary school, dealing one of the most dramatic blows yet to women’s freedoms since seizing power last year.

title: Macron Renews Call for Security Guarantees for Russia
description: The French president has doubled down on his call for the West to provide Russia with security guarantees as part of any negotiations to end the war.

title: Europe Skirts a Winter Slump, but War Fallout Clouds Its Economic Future
description: European businesses are looking to invest in the U.S. as high energy costs damp the continent’s ability to compete.

title: Undercounted Deaths Cloud China's Zero-Covid Exit
description: China’s National Health Commission on Wednesday said there had been no new Covid-related deaths—and that it was retracting one of the Beijing fatalities from the official tally.

title: President Zelensky Looks to Firm Up Ties During Washington Visit
description: The Ukrainian president will meet President Biden and address a joint session of Congress during his trip, which comes after U.S. lawmakers unveiled a spending bill that carries an additional $44.9 billion in aid to help Ukraine and its NATO allies.
